prompt: What kind of animal is prominently featured in the novel "Moby-Dick"?
icl_complete: The novel "Moby-Dick," written by Herman Melville, prominently features a whale. Specifically, the story centers around a giant white sperm whale named Moby Dick and the obsession of Captain Ahab, who seeks to hunt and kill the whale.
judgement: The completion adheres to the feedback accurately.
